parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The image clearly refers to several candidates from the PNL party (National Liberal Party), including their names, photos, and roles (deputat, senator).  This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just individuals.  The public nature of Facebook and the paid promotion ensure it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote the PNL candidates and encourage voters to support them. The visual presentation, including the party logo and the candidates' photos, strongly suggests an intention to influence the vote. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks any objective reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. Instead, it directly promotes specific candidates.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured campaign advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1298743991259471</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It features clear references to specific PNL candidates, uses paid promotion on a public platform to reach a wide audience, and its primary objective is to influence voters to support these candidates. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Aneta MATEI</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Toma PETCU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Maria Gabriela HORGA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Alexandru ANDREI</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Alina MECLEA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Pana Gabriel], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1298743991259471) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidații PNL Aneta Matei, Toma Petcu, Maria Gabriela Horga, Alexandru Andrei și Alina Meclea, cu un buget de publicitate sub 100 RON, atingând 2000-3000 de impresii și o estimare a audienței de 5000-10000 de persoane. Postarea conține CMF 11240002, clar identificând-o ca material de propagandă electorală.  Imaginea și textul postării au ca scop influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților PNL, reprezentând o încălcare clară a legii, având în vedere că perioada de campanie electorală s-a încheiat.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: cosmin.radoi@blueads.ro și +40726405495.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
